p: Spectral quality was estimated according to the full width at half maximum (FWHM) of the CH 2 signal measured at TE = 30 msec (FWHM CH2), the FWHM of the CH 3 signal measured at TE = 1000 msec (FWHM CH3), and SNR, calculated as the ratio of the CH 3 signal amplitude measured at TE = 1000 msec to the last 200 points of free induction decay. Exclusion criteria for in vivo spectra were a FWHM CH3 >30 Hz and SNR <15.
